entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 23 except 19 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 23 except 19 near Lake Erie. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 12:50 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 12:50 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:50 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
